content: Files are stored in a third-party {{thirdpartyTitle}} storage in the "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}" folder. {{thirdpartyPath}}

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a description about file storage when using a third-party storage service. It appears in a UI component related to permanent settings or room creation/delivery, guiding users on where files are stored externally.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "وحدة تخزين تابعة لجهة خارجية" translates to "a third-party storage unit" which is less natural than a direct translation like "تخزين تابع لجهة خارجية" or "تخزين خارجي تابع لجهة خارجية".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يتم تخزين الملفات في تخزين تابع لجهة خارجية {{thirdpartyTitle}} "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}" مجلد.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "مجلد" should be separated from the previous word with a space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يتم تخزين الملفات في تخزين تابع لجهة خارجية {{thirdpartyTitle}} "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}" مجلد .

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The structure "{{thirdpartyTitle}} "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}" مجلد" feels awkward. It should be clearer that the folder name is inside the third-party storage. Also, a colon is preferred before the path.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يتم تخزين الملفات في تخزين تابع لجهة خارجية {{thirdpartyTitle}} في المجلد "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}". {{thirdpartyPath}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "third-party storage" is not accurately translated. "Üçüncü tərəf deposu" implies a 'depository' rather than a storage service.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more accurate translation like "üçüncü tərəf saxlama xidməti" or "üçüncü tərəf əməliyyatçı".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English uses quotation marks around the folder name. The Azerbaijani translation uses the same. This is generally acceptable but ensure consistency across all translations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify this formatting choice is consistent with other similar elements in the application. If not, adjust accordingly.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Bulgarian translation lacks the final period at the end of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Файловете се съхраняват в {{thirdpartyTitle}} хранилище на трета страна в папката "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}". <strong>{{thirdpartyPath}}</strong >.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation maintains the use of `<strong>` tags, mirroring the English. While technically correct, in Greek, bolding is often handled differently and may not be the most natural presentation. Consider if bolding is truly necessary and how it fits within the overall UI design.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Evaluate if the bolding is necessary. If so, ensure it aligns with Greek UI conventions. If not, consider removing the `<strong>` tags.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish translation lacks the same formatting as the English content. In English, the `{{thirdpartyPath}}` is wrapped in a `<strong>` tag. This is missing in the Spanish translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a `` tag around `{{thirdpartyPath}}` in the Spanish translation: "Los archivos se guardan en el almacenamiento de terceros {{thirdpartyTitle}} en la carpeta "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}". "

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Files are stored" is translated as "Les fichiers sont stockés". While technically correct, a more natural and common translation in French would be "Les fichiers sont hébergés" or "Les fichiers sont situés". "Stockés" implies a more permanent storage, which might not be the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les fichiers sont hébergés

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation doesn't include the space before the `<strong/>` tag like the English version. This may cause rendering issues.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les fichiers sont hébergés dans un espace de stockage tiers {{thirdpartyTitle}} dans le dossier "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}". <strong/>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content uses strong tags (<b>) for {{thirdpartyPath}}, but the Italian translation does not.  This breaks the intended visual emphasis.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add tags around {{thirdpartyPath}} in the Italian translation: "I file sono archiviati in uno spazio di archiviazione {{thirdpartyTitle}} di terze parti nella cartella "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}". {{thirdpartyPath}}"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'third-party storage' is translated as '제3자 스토리지'. While technically correct, a more natural Korean phrasing for this context might be '외부 저장소' (external storage) or '타사 저장소' (third-party storage, but more common in this context).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 파일은 "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}" 폴더의 외부 저장소/타사 저장소에 저장됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation maintains the use of curly braces {{ }} for placeholders, just like the English. This may not be standard practice in Lao text and might confuse users. It's generally preferable to use a more localized placeholder representation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing `{{thirdpartyTitle}}`, `{{thirdpartyFolderName}}`, and `{{thirdpartyPath}}` with localized placeholders or variables that are more common in Lao text. For example, using bracketed placeholders like [thirdpartyTitle] or using a designated variable system within the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrase 'ບ່ອນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນຂອງພາກສ່ວນທີສາມ' (bon khep xomua khong pak suan thi sam) can sound a bit verbose. It literally translates to 'storage of third-party'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something more concise, such as 'ບ່ອນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນພາກສ່ວນທີສາມ' (bon khep xomua pak suan thi sam) which translates to 'third-party storage', or perhaps 'ການເກັບຂໍ້ມູນຂອງພາກສ່ວນທີສາມ' (kan khep xomua khong pak suan thi sam) which translates to 'third-party data storage', if the context allows. The best option depends on the intended tone and flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'third-party' is not accurately translated. 'Externe' is a valid translation, but it lacks the implication of a service provided by a different company. A more accurate translation might include 'van een externe partij' or similar to convey the 'third-party' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bestanden worden opgeslagen in een opslag van een externe partij {{thirdpartyTitle}} in de map "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation uses a double quote instead of a single quote. Consistency is important, and single quotes are generally preferred. The quotes should align with the surrounding text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bestanden worden opgeslagen in een externe opslag {{thirdpartyTitle}} in de map '{{thirdpartyFolderName}}'. {{thirdpartyPath}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "third-party storage" is translated as "pamięci zewnętrznej". While technically correct, it doesn't fully convey the implication of a service provider. A more accurate translation might be "usłudze zewnętrznego przechowywania" or "zewnętrznym serwisie przechowywania".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pliki są przechowywane w zewnętrznej usłudze przechowywania {{thirdpartyTitle}}, w katalogu "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation lacks the word 'w' before the folder name. This makes it grammatically awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pliki są przechowywane w pamięci zewnętrznej {{thirdpartyTitle}}, w katalogu "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'armazenados' should be 'armazenados'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: armazenados

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Files are stored' is translated as 'Os arquivos são armazenados'. While technically correct, a more natural and common translation in Brazilian Portuguese would be 'Os arquivos ficam armazenados' or 'Os arquivos estão armazenados'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Os arquivos ficam armazenados em um armazenamento {{thirdpartyTitle}} de terceiros na pasta "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}". {{thirdpartyPath}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The double quotes around the folder name in the English version are not consistently replicated in the Portuguese translation. While acceptable, it's best to maintain consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Os arquivos ficam armazenados em um armazenamento {{thirdpartyTitle}} de terceiros na pasta "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}". {{thirdpartyPath}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "spaţiul de stocare de la terțe" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "third-party storage". It literally translates to "storage space from third parties." A more idiomatic translation would be something like "stocare de la terți" or "stocare externă de la terți".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Fişiere sunt stocate în stocare de la terți...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "de la terțe" should be "de la terți". The Romanian language uses the masculine form when referring to third parties.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Fişiere sunt stocate în stocare de la terți...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of quotation marks is inconsistent with the English version. Both the English and Romanian versions use double quotes. The Romanian version also contains single quotes which could confuse the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Fişiere sunt stocate în stocare de la terți în folderul "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}". {{thirdpartyPath}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Russian translation lacks a space after the period at the end of the first sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Файлы хранятся в стороннем хранилище {{thirdpartyTitle}} в папке "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}". {{thirdpartyPath}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "ආචයනය" (aachayanaya) is an archaic or formal term for storage. A more common and understandable term would be "ගබඩාව" (gabadaawa) or "භාරගැබ" (bhaaragabae).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෙවන පාර්ශ්ව {{thirdpartyTitle}} ගබඩාව තුළ (or භාරගැබ තුළ) ගොනු රඳවා ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "රඳවා ඇත" (randawaa athaa) is technically correct, a more natural phrasing would be "සැimpanan කර ඇත" (simpaan karaa athaa) or "තියවුවා” (thiyawaa).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෙවන පාර්ශ්ව {{thirdpartyTitle}} ගබඩාව තුළ "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}" බහාලුම තුළ ගොනු සැimpanan කර ඇත (or තියවුවා).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation of 'third-party' is 'tretej strany', which is technically correct but sounds a bit formal and unnatural in this context. A more natural phrasing might be 'externého' or 'tretej strany poskytovateľa'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Súbory sú uložené v externom úložisku {{thirdpartyTitle}} alebo v úložisku tretej strany poskytovateľa {{thirdpartyTitle}} v priečinku "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The double quotes around the folder name in the Slovak translation should be consistent with the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Súbory sú uložené v úložisku {{thirdpartyTitle}} tretej strany v priečinku "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation lacks the double quotes around the "{{thirdpartyPath}}" variable, mirroring the English source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Datoteke so shranjene v shrambi tretje osebe {{thirdpartyTitle}} v mapi "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}". {{thirdpartyPath}}"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'folder' is misspelled as 'фолдеру'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: фолдеру should be фолдеру.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses "folderu" instead of "folder". While understandable, "folder" is more common and maintains consistency with the English source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Datoteke se čuvaju u skladištu treće strane {{thirdpartyTitle}} u "{{thirdpartyFolderName}}" folder.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "bir üçüncü taraf olan" is redundant and unnatural in Turkish.  It directly translates to "a third party being" and isn't how this concept is typically expressed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dosyalar, "{thirdpartyFolderName}}" klasöründe {{thirdpartyTitle}} deposunda depolanır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The structure is correct, but it would read more naturally to move the folder name closer to the storage service name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dosyalar, {{thirdpartyTitle}} deposunda bulunan "{thirdpartyFolderName}}" klasöründe depolanır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Các tập tin được lưu trữ trong bộ nhớ của bên thứ ba" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Files are stored in a third-party... storage." A more natural translation would be "Các tập tin được lưu trữ trên dịch vụ lưu trữ của bên thứ ba" or "Các tập tin được lưu trữ trong dịch vụ của bên thứ ba".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Các tập tin được lưu trữ trên dịch vụ lưu trữ của bên thứ ba

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation maintains the English formatting (strong tags) which might not be ideal for the Vietnamese context. It's important to verify if this formatting is intended and culturally appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider if the formatting (strong tags) is necessary in Vietnamese. If not, remove them.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Chinese translation omits the period at the end of the first sentence. The English version has a period after 'folder'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a period at the end of the first sentence: 文件已存储在第三方 {{thirdpartyTitle}} 存储空间的"{{thirdpartyFolderName}}"文件夹中。.
